I voted to pass the bipartisan Presidential #ElectionReformAct because the safety of our presidential elections is a cornerstone of our democracy & without it, we fail to protect our Constitution and our future presidential elections.

This legislation is a major step towards securing and stabilizing our electoral process, ensuring Congress receives one accurate electoral certificate from each state and requiring States select electors in accordance with existing law. (3/3)

As we saw on January 6th, our current laws certifying a presidential election are far too broad and ripe for abuse.

It is long past time to codify these processes and protect America future elections from people willing to undermine our democracy. (2/3)

In January 2021, the 117th Congress began with an insurrection and an attempt to deny the certification of our elections.

I couldn't be prouder to vote to pass the Presidential Election Reform Act to ensure that Congress counts the votes as required by the Constitution (1/3)

The bipartisan Presidential Election Reform Act is the first step to ensuring that future efforts to steal a presidential election from the people will not succeed. I look forward to working with colleagues to strengthen our election system and prevent another deadly attack.
Yet, he continued to push dangerous lies, conspiracies, and bogus legal schemes to the American people to overturn the election and incite the violence that led to January 6.

As the @January6thCmte has shown, former President Donald Trump was fully informed that his claims of election fraud were false and that his efforts to overturn the election were illegal and unconstitutional.

As a 20-year Navy veteran, I took an oath to protect and defend the Constitution from all enemies, foreign & domestic. 

My vote today to protect our democracy and prevent another January 6 attack on the U.S. Capitol is a continuation of that solemn oath. https://luria.house.gov/media/press-releases/rep-luria-votes-to-reform-the-electoral-count-act-protect-the-rule-of-law-and-prevent-another-january-6-attack-0
